item.title: Recurse Center: Week 1
item.description: Wello, horld! Earlier this month I decided to leave my job and spend a few weeks at the Recurse Center, working on my programming skills and taking time to think about what I’d like to do next. Participants aren’t required to write a blog about their time here, but it is a great way to document what you’ve been doing in this busy period, for your future self if nobody else.

item.title: what/why rc
item.description: Introduction opener - sentence or two about career break/recurse center/what i’m planning to do something about how it’s obligatory to write a blog
